comments.body: @tianshapjq this file is what I'm thinking for the file utils tests, let me know what you think

TBH, why do you try to test the Create(), Write() and MkdirAll() of the DefaultFs again? it's already been done in the files.go, and we just have to write some unit tests to the functions in files.go IMH.
BTW, you may need to remove the files created by this test case.

> TBH, why do you try to test the Create(), Write() and MkdirAll() of the DefaultFs again? it's already been done in the files.go, and we just have to write some unit tests to the functions in files.go IMH.

I'm not sure I follow? This file is designed to unit test the functions in files.go.

> BTW, you may need to remove the files created by this test case.

Agree, will add some cleanup.

sorry I didn't make it clear. My point is, you have tested the Create(), Write() and MkdirAll() here, seems my test case #57220 is useless, because my test case just invokes these functions as well. So, is my test case still needed?
I understood #57220 as an effort to test the other utility functions, not the filesystem functions (`FileExists`, `EnsureFile`, `WriteTmpFile`, `ReplaceFile`, `DirExists`, `EnsureDir`).
ok, I will update that pr after this is merged~
